title: Anti-Pattern Definition Schema
description: JSON schema for anti-pattern definitions used by the Vibe Compass MCP detection system

id.description: Unique identifier for the pattern (snake_case, matches property key)

name.description: Human-readable name for the pattern (Title Case)

description.description: Clear description of what the anti-pattern represents

severity.description: Impact severity level of this anti-pattern

detection_threshold.description: Minimum confidence score (0.1-1.0) required to trigger detection

indicators.description: Positive indicators that suggest the presence of this anti-pattern

negative_indicators.description: Negative indicators that reduce confidence in pattern detection

regex.description: Regular expression pattern to match in text (case-insensitive matching)

description.description: Human-readable description of what this indicator detects

weight.description: Confidence contribution (0.1-0.5) when this indicator matches

text.description: Short label for this indicator type

regex.description: Regular expression pattern to match in text (case-insensitive matching)

description.description: Human-readable description of what this negative indicator detects

weight.description: Negative confidence contribution (-0.5 to -0.1) when this indicator matches
